entries.journal_entry_description: With the troubles on Tansarii Point Station, not enough people are coming to the Cantina to have fun.  Bring in an audience.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The music is set, but Anvar needs more dancers. Go and dance at the Cantina and catch the customer's eyes. Perform for 20 seconds.To dance, click on the Start Dance icon and then right-click in the main screen. You can do special moves by left-clicking on a flourish button and then right-clicking on your character. To stop dancing, left-click on the Stop Dance icon and right-click on your character.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The crowd loves you! Show them how good you are! Perform for 20 seconds.To dance, click on the Start Dance icon and then right-click in the main screen. You can do special moves by left-clicking on a flourish button and the right-clicking on your character. To stop dancing, left-click on the Stop Dance icon and right-click on your character.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Talk to Anvar and tell him of your success.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Talk to Anvar Keyis in the Cantina
